location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas H Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris to the Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Thomas H Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris [Tabriz, Iran] to the Acting Resident at Bushire, informing that the packet sent by Cossid contains His Majesty's Envoy's [Sir Harford Jones] letters to be forwarded safely to His Majesty's Ambassador Extraordinary, Sir Gore Ouseley.
